about_the_game:
Demo Version

This is a free demo for the RPG, Tower Song! In the demo, player can command Tali or Neat as they fully explore the first chapter of the game.

About the Game

Tower Song is a character-driven JRPG where a band of heroes struggle to save the nation of Qadam from the vengeful Forge Goddess who threatens to burn the continent to ash.


Players choose one of four heroes for their journey: the rampaging berserker, the cosmic witch and her cat familiar, the philosophical street fighter, or the Exosuit-piloting, spell-slinging technomancer.


Load your rifle, prepare your spells and sharpen your weapons. Tower Song is a 16-bit SNES style RPG where foes are deadly, and victory requires thoughtful strategy.


Our heroes will journey overland across multiple biomes before descending into the mysterious Towers.

Can you stop the Tower Song and save Qadam? Or will you falter beneath the terrible Cycle?

Demo Features:
  • 1- 2 hours of play time, including the complete first chapter of the game
  • Choose from two (of the final four) playable characters
  • Challenging turn-based battles
  • Multiple difficulty modes to suit your playstyle
  • No random encounters; enemies visibly roam the wilds
  • Pixel SNES style graphics
